lines.msg: Here rest Deave, he will be missed
It's true ... I really miss you my friend ... I wish you were there ...
Oh shit ! This guy wasn't joking after all !
Puddle ? Is it you ? What are you doing here ?!
Dea ... Dea ... Deave ? Is this you ? Is this really you ?
Yeah it's me buddy, I've met some weird dude in the Death World and he wasn't to please to meet me and here I am I guess !

*looks at himself*
Oooh !
I can see why you didn't recognise me, must be a side effet of what he did to me
Ummh I don't know my dead best friend just came out of nowhere ! I've missed you friend.

I've missed you too Puddle.
* Hugs Puddle *
*clear his throat*
 Well ...
I'm sorry to ask you this but would you mind helping me get back to the Death World ? I can't really stay here long, rules of the almighty and all.
But you've just arrived ! I finally got you back, a second chance !
Yeah that's not really how it works, but I'll still be here for a while I need you to help me get my colors back before I can leave
They must have been scattered somewhere in the process
I need my colors to get back to the Death World, can you find them ?
